Package actor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Act
    Created an interface for the Actors which need the Act method, as not all classes that implement Actor need Act.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    The Actor class is used to define any sprite in the program, for example the player and obstacles.
    BackgroundImage
    Defines the creation of the background object.
    End
    Defines the frog goals/ targets at the end of the level.
    EndTest
    Unit Tests for the End Class
    Overlay
    Originally called Digit, this class is used both to display the score but also the hearts to the player It therefore lets use place an Actor onto the screen as an overlay with ease.
    PanningActorTest
    Unit testing for the panning actor class.
    PlayerTest
    Unit tests for the Player Class
